about.summary: A series of functions in some way considered useful to the author.  These include functions for subsetting tables and generating indices for arrays, conditioning and intervening in probability distributions, generating combinations and more...

name: r-rje
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.10.15" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-rje
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/rje_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/rje/rje_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 72e33f7b45cef97a0d6e18f3251d2f5fe5ea07c023e4fc603edf8ec17470cd7c

build:
  merge_build_host: true  # [win]
  number: 1
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}              # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_c') }}        # [win]
    - {{ posix }}filesystem        # [win]
    - {{ posix }}make
    - {{ posix }}sed               # [win]
    - {{ posix }}coreutils         # [win]
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-knitr
  run:
    - r-base
    - {{ native }}gcc-libs         # [win]
    - r-knitr

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('rje')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('rje')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=rje
  license: GPL-2
  summary: A series of functions in some way considered useful to the author.  These include functions for subsetting tables and generating indices for arrays, conditioning
    and intervening in probability distributions, generating combinations and more...
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: rje
# Type: Package
# Title: Miscellaneous Useful Functions for Statistics
# Version: 1.10.10
# Authors@R: c(person("Robin", "Evans", email="evans@stats.ox.ac.uk", role=c("aut", "cre")), person("Mathias", "Drton", role=c("ctb")))
# Description: A series of functions in some way considered useful to the author.  These include functions for subsetting tables and generating indices for arrays, conditioning and intervening in probability distributions, generating combinations and more...
# Depends: R (>= 2.0.0),
# License: GPL (>= 2)
# LazyLoad: yes
# Imports: knitr
# Suggests: testthat, rmarkdown
# VignetteBuilder: knitr
# Packaged: 2019-08-26 11:15:48 UTC; evans
# Author: Robin Evans [aut, cre], Mathias Drton [ctb]
# Maintainer: Robin Evans <evans@stats.ox.ac.uk>
# RoxygenNote: 6.1.1
# NeedsCompilation: yes
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-08-28 04:30:02 UTC
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
3.7.0
